description: Lightning-fast, zero-dependency TypeScript utility suite featuring an isomorphic ApiClient with retries, a robust Async Toolkit (retry, parallel, debounce), and a CLI for Swagger/OpenAPI type generation.

features.api_client: Isomorphic fetch wrapper with interceptors and circuit breakers
features.async_toolkit: Retry with backoff, concurrency control, and AggregateError support
features.validation: Comprehensive suite of validators for common data types
